main event: A series of reports and letters regarding UFO sightings in Cleveland, Ohio, during July 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as circular with a bright, pulsating light,The observer stated the object accelerated and moved out of sight rapidly,Other reports included sightings of a bright white light larger than a star,These letters indicate a lack of evidence leading to insufficient information for UFO categorization,Several witnesses were involved, but details on their descriptions were not provided.
sighted object: circular object emitting pulsating light; bright white light
witness description: A mature and reliable observer associated with military activity.
